body:
Ahh, toxicity, the thing that binds Avicus together, the thing that seperates 10yr olds and more mature peeps.

Yup, everyone hates them toxic peeps that be saying stuff like " Go suck a **** and L!!!" <--------------This was used for educational purposes so pls dont remove it

But what really is toxicity and how do you deal with it?
Before you go to the reply section and reply "BUT CLICKN, TOXIC PEOPLE ARE RADIOACTIVE AND THEY SHOULD BE DED BY NOW AND NOT PLAYING MC HUHH". No fellow keyboard warrior, there are 2 types of Toxic People, radioactive induced people, and 10yr olds being hypocrites and are straight out rude to anyone for no reason or a dumb reason, 

For example,
Clickn vs 2good4U, Say i beat him, If hes NOT toxic, he will probs say good fight or something, But if he IS toxic, he will probs go Super Saiyan and say stuff like "LMAO SWEATY TRYHARD I ACTUALLY HAVE A LIFE UNLIKE U" 

Now, this might tempt you to say things back, or roast him back, DONT, AND I REPEAT DONT, Its only going to make it worse

Instead, report the player and the Staff team will warn him, as said in the rules, Section A  #3 . If he repeats, he could get a mute or if serious like suicide encouragement or ddos threats, he could get a perm mute or a tempban  as said in Section A #9. 

Anyways, this is all,
TOODLEZ BOOZLEZ BAMBOOZLES FOLKS

Clickn out

TOODLEZ BOOZLEZ BAMBOOZLES FOLKS

Clickn out
title: How to deal with Toxicity lol

replies.body:
Haha, same old Avicus
It honestly depends on the person. There's people who will, no matter what you tell them, retort to the slightest verbal offense, and mayhem unfolds
If you try to knock some maturity into them, it's likely they'll be offended regardless of how you word it, too (it's not the case for all people, some do understand, but it's worth pointing out some people behave that way too)
But I understand what you're trying to get at, and that's a good thing. Personally, I give any offenses the cold shoulder, because witty comebacks or responding with just as much hostility won't bring any justice to the situation
That being said,

P E E    Y O U R   P A N T S ! ! ! (/joke)
